page.title: 15A Possible Future?
page.content: One very interesting development for {Heywood} emerged from the work done by the children of St. Joseph's School. It is possible that Heywood is becoming a {Dormitory town,}especially for Manchester. Several factors point in this direction. There has been considerable private housing development, close to the{ Motorway,} at Hopwood, yet there has been no major industrial development. There is a much greater amount of {Storage {space,} which uses the Motorway. This is borne out by the work of the {Fire {Brigade}which now concentrates on Storage and on the Motorway.(See p.16) A survey of {Housing} in the area showed that many people living there worked away, mainly in Manchester, but also in Leeds, Wigan and Warrington.It may be that the {Future} of Heywood lies in this direction.
